items.name: Apple
items.description: A sweet, juicy fruit.

items.name: Strawberry
items.description: A small red berry.

items.name: Watermelon
items.description: A large fruit with sweet, watery flesh.

items.name: Bread
items.description: A simple loaf of bread. Fills the stomach decently.

items.name: Mushroom
items.description: A black mushroom. Edible, but be careful with unknown species.

items.name: Stew
items.description: A hot stew made from fresh ingredients.

items.name: Raw Meat
items.description: A bloody, uncooked chunk of meat. Needs cooking first.

items.name: Cooked Meat
items.description: A nicely roasted piece of meat, ready to be eaten.

items.name: Grilled Mushroom
items.description: A mushroom roasted over a fire, with a smoky flavor.

items.name: Grilled Fish
items.description: A simple cooked fish.

items.name: Firegill
items.description: A spicy grilled fish with a sharp kick.

items.name: Ashfish
items.description: Fish baked in hot ashes. Simple but hearty.

items.name: Healing Potion
items.description: A red potion that heals your wounds when consumed.

items.name: Mana Potion
items.description: A blue potion that restores magical energy.

items.name: Water Bottle
items.description: A bottle filled with clean water. Hydrates the body.

items.name: Dagger
items.description: A short blade, quick and deadly in close combat.

items.name: Dirk
items.description: A long, thin dagger with a razor-sharp point designed for thrusting.

items.name: Kris
items.description: A wavy-bladed ceremonial dagger with mystical properties.

items.name: Rondel
items.description: A heavy thrusting dagger with a rigid blade, perfect for piercing armor.

items.name: Short Sword
items.description: A light, versatile sword for swift melee attacks.

items.name: Falchion
items.description: A curved, single-edged sword with a heavy blade for powerful slashing strikes.

items.name: Broad Sword
items.description: A wide, double-edged sword offering excellent balance between offense and defense.

items.name: Sword of Dawn
items.description: A legendary blade that shines with morning light.

items.name: Woodcutter's Axe
items.description: A long-handled axe designed for felling trees. Too unwieldy for combat, but excellent for chopping wood.

items.name: Hand Axe
items.description: A one-handed axe. Good for chopping and combat.

items.name: Broad Axe
items.description: A heavy axe with a wide blade. Ideal for powerful woodcutting and deadly strikes.

items.name: Double Axe
items.description: A dual-bladed axe that can cleave through multiple enemies with devastating force.

items.name: War Axe
items.description: A massive battle axe designed for breaking through heavy armor and shields.

items.name: Spiked Club
items.description: A crude club with metal spikes. Brutal but effective.

items.name: Mace
items.description: A heavy, flanged weapon designed to crush armor and bones with blunt force.

items.name: Hammer
items.description: A two-handed war hammer capable of delivering devastating crushing blows.

items.name: Spear
items.description: A long weapon for stabbing enemies from a distance.

items.name: Pilum
items.description: A heavy javelin designed to penetrate shields and disable enemy formations.

items.name: Harpoon
items.description: A barbed spear originally used for fishing, now adapted for deadly combat.

items.name: Leather Armor
items.description: Basic protective armor made of treated animal hide.

items.name: Warden Armor
items.description: Reinforced leather armor with metal studs, worn by guards and sentries.

items.name: Sacred Armor
items.description: Blessed chainmail that glows faintly with divine protection.

items.name: Flamescale Armor
items.description: Armor crafted from dragon scales, providing excellent protection against fire.

items.name: Ancient Armor
items.description: Mysterious plate armor from a forgotten civilization, inscribed with arcane runes.

items.name: Troll Crown
items.description: A powerful crown said to be worn by ancient troll kings.

items.name: Firewood
items.description: Chopped wood used to start and maintain a fire.

items.name: Fishing Rod
items.description: A sturdy rod used for fishing.

items.name: Silver Pike
items.description: A sleek fish with silvery scales, caught from the river.

items.name: Roach
items.description: A common silver fish with red fins, adaptable to various freshwater habitats.

items.name: Zander
items.description: A predatory fish with a rich taste, caught from the river.

items.name: Book of Fireball
items.description: An ancient tome containing the secrets of the Fireball spell.

items.name: Book of Heal
items.description: A sacred book inscribed with the knowledge of the Heal spell.

items.name: Scroll of Heal
items.description: A magical scroll that casts the Heal spell when read.

items.name: Scroll of Fireball
items.description: A magical scroll that casts the Fireball spell when read.
